description:

And it still isn’t over! Flower throws down the squirting gauntlet for Annie Cruz and challenges the Fuckingmachines reining champ to a squirt off. Flower loves to fuck as much as she loves to compete so now it is up to Annie to accept the Flower Tucci challenge. Annie – are you game?
title: Flower Tucci
